span.p:
Primary MongoDB
Port: 27017
Restored from backup
Ready for operations
Independent oplog

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Secondary MongoDB 1
Port: 27018
Async replication
Read operations
Local oplog replay

span.p:
Secondary MongoDB 2
